text:
[Verse]
Under the gray sky we run
Laughing until we cry
Puddles splashing one by one
Feeling oh so high

[Verse 2]
Drops fall on my face
Cold but I don't care
In this crazy water chase
Love is in the air

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Letting go of pain
Feel the beat insane
Heart in this refrain

[Verse 3]
No need for an umbrella
Just the rhythm in our feet
Spinning like a Cinderella
Life so bittersweet

[Bridge]
Lightning strikes so far
We shine brighter than a star
Every moment
Here we are
Nothing left to mar

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Letting go of pain
Feel the beat insane
Heart in this refrain
title: Dancing in the Rain
